name: A. Plus or Minus
statement: You are given three integers , , and  such that  of these two equations is true:       Output  if the first equation is true, and  otherwise.
input: The first line contains a single integer  () — the number of test cases. The description of each test case consists of three integers , ,  (, ). The additional constraint on the input: it will be generated so that  one of the two equations will be true.
output: For each test case, output either  or  on a new line, representing the correct equation.
tutorial: You need to implement what is given in the statement; for example, you can use an if-statement to output  if , and  otherwise.
